p: In addition, the worsening severity of CHIKF has been associated with increased plasma levels of IL-1β and IL-6 and a reduced level in RANTES. As in RA, high levels of IL-1β may also mediate the development of abrupt and persistent arthralgia [ 68]. In a recent study, levels of all cytokines that were elevated in patients with CCA (IL1 -RA, IL-6, IL-8, MIP-1a, MIP-1b, and MCP-1) returned to control levels following disease resolution, indicating that elevations of these cytokines were specific for patients who develop chronic arthritis [ 65].
